title: Terminator Dark Fate first reactions deem it series' best since T2 Judgement Day
text:

They may have changed the future, but they didn't change our fate.

Despite seemingly preventing Judgement Day at the end of Terminator 2: Judgement Day, Sarah Connor ( Linda Hamilton ) finds that the dark threats of the future remain in new instalment Terminator Dark Fate.

With Hamilton back in her iconic role opposite Arnold Schwarzenegger as the original Terminator, the pair must move past their differences and unite with an enhanced human from the future (Mackenzie Davis) to protect a young woman (Natalia Reyes) who is being hunted.

But after the poor responses to the last three Terminator films, should we expect the worse?

Well, apparently, Terminator Dark Fate has put the franchise back on track, if the first reactions are anything to go by.

Terminator Dark Fate first reactions

(Image: Kerry Brown)

Steven Weintraub of Collider wrote : " #TerminatorDarkFate is easily the best Terminator movie since T2. Has some fantastic action and loved how the film features 3 female protagonists that all kick-ass. So awesome seeing Linda Hamilton back as Sarah Connor."

Meanwhile, writer Christopher Schmitt said : "Saw a surprise advanced screening of @Terminator : Dark Fate. If you’re a fan, go see it — it’s the #Terminator sequel we’ve been waiting for."

Germain Lussier of Gizmodo and io9 wrote : "Terminator: Dark Fate is basically Terminator: The Force Awakens. A satisfying, exciting reboot that’s essentially the best parts of T1 & T2 in a blender. Davis, Reyes & Hamilton are excellent, the action wows & while it’s familiar, it’s easily the best T3 yet. Terminator is back"

(Image: Twentieth Century Fox)

Matt Singer of Screencrus.com said : "TERMINATOR’s thought of as Arnold’s franchise. DARK FATE makes it clear he wasn’t the key ingredient that made it work. It was Linda Hamilton. She’s incredible in this, and the movie’s very solid. (I recently defended all the TERMINATOR sequels, so make of this what you will.)"

Finally, Mike Ryan of Uproxx noted : "I was skeptical of TERMINATOR: DARK FATE. Thought the trailers were not great. But I would up enjoying it quite a bit, and the difference maker (vs the other post T2 sequels) is Linda Hamilton. It’s always been HER story and Hamilton adds the needed weight here."

Well, maybe we should get our hopes up after all!

Terminator Dark Fate is released in UK cinemas on October 23, 2019.

Are you excited for Terminator Dark Fate? Let us know in the comments below.
description: Terminator Dark Fate sees Linda Hamilton reprise her iconic role as Sarah Connor opposite Arnold Schwarzenegger
